Text: State and County VerificationPlease be advised that we have discrepancies with the State and County information for the meter No s listed on the attached spreadsheet Will you please review this spreadsheet and provide the State and County information that you may have for the listed meters If you are not the scheduler for this pipe please forward this to the appropriate scheduler Please do not hesitate to contact me Thank you Ryan Sheeren Enron Net Works Global Facilities

RE New Trade Zone for PGLC Cc I have changed the Trade Zone on the meter mentioned below If anybody has any questions please do not hesitate to contact me Thank you Ryan Sheeren Enron Net Works Global Facilities Original Message From Grant George Sent Friday October PM To Love Phillip M Pendergrass Cora Sheeren Ryan Severson Russ Cc Kinsey Lisa Sweitzer Tara Subject RE New Trade Zone for PGLC I meant the new TTP zone so no problem I went ahead and mapped PGLCTTP just like PGLCNGPL GG Original Message From Love Phillip M Sent Friday October PM To Pendergrass Cora Grant George Sheeren Ryan Severson Russ Cc Kinsey Lisa Sweitzer Tara Subject RE New Trade Zone for PGLC RussGeorge has this new location been mapped to the same curves as the previous location PGLCNGPL From my standpoint I think that is the only thing that needs to be done with the exception of changingadding swaps on these deals Please let me know Thanks PL Original Message From Pendergrass Cora Sent Friday October PM To Grant George Sheeren Ryan Severson Russ Cc Kinsey Lisa Love Phillip M Sweitzer Tara Subject RE New Trade Zone for PGLC We have moved november deals to the new location is that going to be a problem They were previously on PGLCNGPL and they were moved to PGLCNGPLTTP These deals will need to be moved to the new trade zone of TTP Is there anything else we need to do for Sitara and if so who do we need to contact THanks COra Original Message From Grant George Sent Friday October PM To Sheeren Ryan Severson Russ Cc Pendergrass Cora Kinsey Lisa Subject RE New Trade Zone for PGLC It is important to note that no deals can be moved to this new location until this location is mapped in Sitaramid notional and gas daily curves otherwise any deals booked there will error out in CPR Thanks GG Original Message From Sheeren Ryan Sent Thursday October PM To Grant George Severson Russ Subject FW New Trade Zone for PGLC FYI Original Message From Pendergrass Cora Sent Thursday October AM To Sheeren Ryan Subject RE New Trade Zone for PGLC Ok i am getting with Patrice We were thinking that it would be November but I think Patrice wants this set up ASAP I will get back with you as quickly as I know Thanks Original Message From Sheeren Ryan Sent Thursday October AM To Pendergrass Cora Subject FW New Trade Zone for PGLC Importance High Cora George Grant has set up the new Trade Zone TTP for Meter No TTP on PGLC He has told me there are deals behind Meter No TTP with the Trade Zone of PGLC Please let me know when a good time to change the Trade Zone is Thank you Ryan Sheeren Enron Net Works Global Facilities Original Message From Sheeren Ryan Sent Wednesday October PM To Grant George Sweitzer Tara Subject FW New Trade Zone for PGLC Importance High Original Message From Sheeren Ryan Sent Tuesday October PM To Grant George Severson Russ Cc Hilliard Marlene Subject FW New Trade Zone for PGLC Importance High Mr Grant Cora Pendergrass is asking for a Trade Zone in PGLC to be created She also would like me to change the Trade Zone on meter TTP to this new Trade Zone She has told me she has already changed the deals behind the meter to match the new Trade Zone I will change the Trade Zone with your final approval Trade Zone PGLC TTP Meter TTP Pipecode PGLC Please let me know as soon as possible Original Message From Hilliard Marlene Sent Tuesday October PM To Sheeren Ryan Subject FW New Trade Zone for PGLC Importance High Will you please take of this Original Message From Pendergrass Cora Sent Tuesday October PM To Severson Russ Campos Sylvia A Hilliard Marlene Cc Kinsey Lisa Subject New Trade Zone for PGLC Importance High Effective November we need to set up a new trade zone for PGLC The new zone should be called PGLC TTP The meter number TTP should be mapped to this new trade zone It is currently under NGPL We have moved deals for November to this new point on ENA EMW and ENV If you have any questions please let me know Also we are trying to get to a point to upload this file for next month so when this is updated can you let me know Thanks for your help Cora

RE Deals Thank you Original Message From Reitmeyer Jay Sent Tuesday November AM To Sheeren Ryan Subject RE Deals I fixed the deals I was waiting for a new pricing index to be set up in Sitara That is done now Jay Reitmeyer Original Message From Sheeren Ryan Sent Tuesday November AM To Reitmeyer Jay Subject Deals Jay I am with the gas confirms group and I need to verify the location and price for these two Oneok deals Thank you Ryan Sheeren Enron Net Works Office
Deals Jay I am with the gas confirms group and I need to verify the location and price for these two Oneok deals Thank you Ryan Sheeren Enron Net Works Office
Deal No Mr Reitmeyer Please confirm the index price on these two deals Thank you Ryan Sheeren Enron Net Works Office
